definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: withhold, refrain (NH [[חָסַח]], Aram. [[חֲסַח]], h.sak; Palm. [[חסך]] remit, spare, Vog:Nos. 6:15; Sab. [[משחכן]] weaned (child) DHM:ZMG 1875, 608)—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: withhold, keep back, keep for oneself, acc., Ge 22:12 (E), v:Ge 22:16, Ge 39:9 (sq. [[מִמֶּגִּי]]; both J); abs. Pr 21:26 (opp. [[נׇתַן]]); withhold the rod ([[שׁבט]]) in discipline, Pr 13:24; no obj. expr. Pr 11:24, Pr 24:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: keep one from evil, calamity, She’ôl, etc., c. acc. and [[מִן]] Ge 20:6 (E), 1Sa 25:39, Ps 19:14; [[מִמָּוֶת נַפְשָׁם]] ´[[ח]] Ps 78:50 cf. Job 33:18, Is 38:7 (rd. [[חָשַׂכְתָּ]] or [[חֲשׂח]] for MT [[חָשַׁקְתָּ]], v. [[חשׁק]]); abs. hinder (i.e. calamities fr. coming) Is 14:6; [[לְמַטָח מֵעֲוֹנֵנוּ]] ´[[ח]] Ezr 9:13 thou hast kept back, downward (= and kept down), part of our iniquity, i.e. hast not punished us according to our full desert.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: hold in check c. acc. 2Sa 18:16 (or spare v. infr.); obj. [[רַגְלֵיהֶם]] Je 14:10; esp. of keeping silence, obj. [[פִּי]] Job 7:11 restrain my mouth, [[שׂפתים]] Pr 10:19, [[אמרים]] Pr 17:27; [[רׂק]] ´[[מִפָּנַי לאׁ ח]] Job 30:10 from my face they have not withheld spittle (= they have spit in my face).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: refrain (fr. doing what is mentioned in the context), abs. Is 54:2, Is 58:1.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: spare, c. acc. pers. 2Ki 5:20 he hath spared Naaman [[מִקַּחַת]] so as not to take (= and hath not taken anything) out of his hand; perh. also 2Sa 18:16 Joab spared the people (v. supr.).
(abs.) restrain, check (pain) i.e. assuage, so appar. MT Job 16:5 (v. Di Kau; I would not restrain condolence of my lips, LXX SyrVer Me, rdg. [[לא אחשׂך]] for [[יחשׂך]]).—Ez Eze 30:18 v. [[חשׁך]].
